title: Updated Mid-Century * InnerLoop * 2 bed / 1 bath
posting_body: ['* Recently updated, Mid-Century Modern flat coming available soon in the Highland Village / Afton Oaks area.', '*', '* 2 full bedroom / 1 bath flat', '* Updated kitchen w/ all newer appliances (gas range)', '* Original mid-century hardwood floors (just refinished)', '* Newer central air and heat (high efficiency / low bills)', '* Newer paint', '* Washer and dryer included', '* Assigned, off-street, covered parking (up to two cars per unit)', '- Works great as a 1+ study / office as well', '- Boutique property in super quiet, upscale neighborhood (Afton Oaks) (only 8 units total)', '- Pet friendly landlord', 'This is the opposite of giant-econobox-apartment living.', 'Here, you park 20 steps from your front door and you actually get to know the people who live around you.', 'All tenants are quiet professionals.', '(I went to look at a couch for sale at a giant new apartment complex not far from this property the other day', 'and--I kid you not--I had to go up an elevator AND walk at least 1/4 mile through a maze of dimly lit Kafkaesque hallways just to get to her front door.)', 'Killer location just inside the loop from the Galleria area.', "Walking distance to 100's of shops, restaurants, grocery, fitness, etc... but in a very quiet, high-end residential enclave.", 'Extremely walk-able area with very little thru traffic, big lawns, tons of mature trees.', 'Great for dog-walking, biking, jogging, etc.', 'Easy / short walk to the Galleria, Uptown, Central Market, 24 hr Fitness, CVS, etc.', 'Reply to this posting with any questions or to schedule a personal walk-through of the space.', 'I can also put you in touch with one or more of the current / long term tenants if you want to get their perspective on the location, the property, the management, etc.', 'You can also call or text the number listed in this ad.', 'highland village afton oaks river oaks galleria downtown properties inside loop midtown uptown montrose medusa museum district rice university heights greenway plaza bellaire west u innerloop']
